LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.Enabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the Rich Blog plugin will be enabled.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.NumberOfBlogPostsToShow
LocaleResource.Value: Number of Blog Posts to show (home page)

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.NumberOfBlogPostsToShow.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the number of visible blog posts on the home page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.ShowPrevNextNavigation
LocaleResource.Value: Show Previous/Next navigation on Blog Post page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.ShowPrevNextNavigation.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Show Previous/Next navigation on Blog Post page, which could be used to navigate to prev/next blog post arranged by date of creation.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.ShowImageOnBlogPostPage
LocaleResource.Value: Show Image On Blog Details Page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.ShowImageOnBlogPostPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set to show the image on the top of the blog post detail page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.ShowOnHomePage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check if you want this blog post to be shown on the Home page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.HomePagePictureId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The home page picture of the blog post

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.PictureId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The picture which will be shown on blog details / blog list page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.RelatedBlogPost.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the blog post before you add related blog posts.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Category.LanguageId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify for which language this category will be shown.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Category.DisplayOrder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Display Order is responsible for aranging the categories in the category or post category navigations.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Category.Published.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check this setting if you want to make the category visible to the public area.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.NumberOfCharactersInBlogPostPreviewOnHomePage
LocaleResource.Value: Number of characters in blog post preview - Home Page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.NumberOfCharactersInBlogPostPreviewOnHomePage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify the number of characters you want your blog post preview to have on home page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.NumberOfCharactersInBlogPostPreviewOnBlogListPage
LocaleResource.Value: Number of characters in blog post preview - Blog list page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.NumberOfCharactersInBlogPostPreviewOnBlogListPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify the number of characters you want your blog post preview to have on blog list page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.ShowFacebookShare.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you check this every blog post will have a Facebook Share button.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.ShowTwitterShare.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you check this every blog post will have a Twitter Share button.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.ShowPinterestShare.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you check this every blog post will have a Pinterest Share button.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.ShowLinkedInShare.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you check this every blog post will have a LinkedIn Share button.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.ShowGooglePlusShare.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you check this every blog post will have a Google+ Share button.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.ExcludedTags.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enter the tags you want to exclude from blog post preview e.g. img, span, strong...

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.HomePageImageSize.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the image size for the Home page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.HomePageWidgetZone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose in which widget zone the home page blogs will appear.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.BlogCategoryNavigationWidgetZone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose in which widget zone the category navigation will appear.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.BlogDetailsImageSize.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the image size for the blog details page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.BlogDetailsImageWidgetZone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose in which widget zone the image of every blog post will appear on blog details page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.BlogDetailsPrevNextWidgetZone
LocaleResource.Value: Blog details prev/next blog post widget zone

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.BlogDetailsPrevNextWidgetZone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose in which widget zone the prev/next buttons of every blog post will appear.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.BlogListImageWidgetZone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose in which widget zone the image of every blog post will appear on blog list page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.BlogSearchWidgetZone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose in which widget zone the search box will appear.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.NumberOfResultsInDropdown.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the number of results in the autocomplete dropdown when searching.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.ResultsPageNumberOfItemsPerPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the number of items per page on results page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.HighlightedTextChunkLength.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the length of the highlighted text chunk. This is the number of characters returned around the found search term.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.RichBlog.Admin.Settings.Reindex.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Click the button if you want to re-index the blog posts.
